name: Bouncy Knight
description:
It's just a prototype, you can't lose or win. It's made for #fuckthisjam. I tried to make a casual game for kids, because I never do it before.


Made by: @andmish
Music by: Kevin MacLeod "One-eyed Maestro"
Sound from: www.freesound.org and freesfx.co.uk
Font: Full Dece Sans

Notes
  • For the best performance use Chrome
  • Made for #fuckthisjam within 5 days
  • The game doesn't save the results
